title: Budget Lines
content:
A budget line defines the amount of planned expenditure for some budget types in a given accounting period.

To create a budget line, you must first create the following financial metadata:

  • A budget type, which describes the categories of financial activities in your company.
    For details, see How to create a budget type record.
  • A budget center, which enables you to manage and analyze the budgets and allocation in your company.
    For details, see How to create a budget center record.
  • A budget, which is a financial plan for a defined accounting period.
    For details, see How to create a budget record.
